documentation.description: Retrieve possible transitions of state for a given issue id. (e.g. Transition from 'NEW' to 'IN_PROGRESS' state) Configure must be called before calling this template.

output.description:
A list of
Transition
objects representing the possible transitions for the issue referenced by the id.

documentation.sample: <call-template target="org.wso2.carbon.jira.configure"> <with-param name="jira.uri" value="http://myjira.com:8080/jira/"/> <with-param name="jira.username" value="admin"/> <with-param name="jira.password" value="admin"/> </call-template> <call-template target="org.wso2.carbon.jira.getTransitions"> <with-param name="jira.issueId" value="TP-1"/> </call-template>

parameter.name: jira.issueId
parameter.description: a String containing the issue id.
